for i in range(int(input())):
    p = int(input())
    lst = []
    for i in range(p - 1):
        lst.append(i + 2)
    lst.append(1)
    print(*lst)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    print(2, end=' ')
    for i in range(3, n + 1):
        print(i, end=' ')
    print(1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    res = [k % n + 1 for k in range(1, n + 1)]
    print(' '.join(map(str, res)))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    li = []
    for i in range(2, n + 1):
        li.append(i)
    li.append(1)
    print(*li)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    lst = [i for i in range(1, n + 1)]
    sp = 0
    ep = len(lst) - 1
    while ep > 0:
        (lst[sp], lst[ep]) = (lst[ep], lst[sp])
        ep -= 1
    for i in lst:
        print(i, end=' ')
    print()

        z += 1
